thought: The Slack action (action_2) is failing because its params are not set correctly. Slack requires the 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and importantly the 'text' parameter with the expression to extract text from input_data. I need to set these parameters properly to send messages to the #general channel.
plan: Set 'select' to 'channel' to send to a channel
Set 'channelId' mode to 'name' and value to 'general'
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for simple text messages
Set 'text' parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract text from input_data
Test sending messages to Slack again
criticism: Currently, action_2 has empty params which causes execution failure. Properly setting these params is essential for Slack message sending to work.

tool_input.comments: Send classified news headlines with category to Slack channel #general with properly set parameters.
